result.execSummary:
The defendant Cory M Hardcastle was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
$500.00 cash bond to be applied towards Court costs.
In the event of non-payment of outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

records.addlTxt: Does not plan to seek postconviction relief

Defendant Cory M Hardcastle in court with attorney Frederick A Bechtold.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14CT131, 14CM447 and 15CM33 called.  State recites agreement.  Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights presented and discussed.  The Court finds plea is knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given and finds the defendant guilty.  State relates.  Attorney Bechtold relates.  Court relates and orders:

14CT131
Count 1 - Guilty plea
Count 2 - DRI
.09 BAC nonaggravated
$1,379 fine - 60 DTP
10 days jail - Credit for 2 days - Report to jail by 4:00 PM today
12 month DL revocation
AODA
12 month Ignition Interlock

14CM447 - DRI
Defendant agrees to forfeit the $500 cash bond to the Barron County General Fund pursuant to Wis. Stats. Sec. 969.13(1) - Court orders bond forfeited.

15CM33 - Guilty plea
Court costs - 60 DTP
10 days jail - Consecutive to 14CT131 - Credit for 10 days

14TR720, 14TR721 and 14TR722 are Dismissed

Defendant Cory M Hardcastle in court with attorney Frederick A Bechtold.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. THIS COVERS 14CT131, 15CM33 AND 14CM447. 14CT131 set for JT on 6/5/15 as backup. Jury instructions, verdict forms, witness lists and Motions in Limine be filed with the Court no later than 5/22/15. Defense has 30 days to file any substantive motions. Bond continues. Other cases track along.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 18, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

An additional $500.00 must be posted. 
Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.  
Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages.  
May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold.  
Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.
Must report for daily PBT's at 6:00 PM at the Rice Lake Police Department.

Defendant Cory M Hardcastle in court with attorney Lauren Olivia Otto.  Defendant Cory M Hardcastle in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Qualifies for PD. Waive formal reading. Not guilty pleas entered. 
All files reset to 3/2/15 at 2:00 PM (15CM33, 14CM447, 14CT131, 14TR720,721 and 722)
  Plea hearing scheduled for March 2, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
